text: Jwankongwe jwachigwagwa ni jwannume jwachikululu basi jenumanja munnyesyani jwalijose mwa jamanjao mipichi jakwana lichila , soni chikantesya chanasa ligongo lyaŵaŵilio pa (kupitisya) dini ja Allah (malamusi galamwile pa ŵanyao), nam’baga jenumanja nkunkulupililaga Allah ni Lisiku Lyambesi. Soni likuga lya ŵakulupilila lilolele ilagasyo yaoyo
